attributes.action: Scrap Jury's - give power to judges to convict
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop inexperienced members of the public giving inaccurate convictions to murderers.  Too many murderers are being acquitted even after damning evidence that they are guilty.  This decision should be made by the authorities that know the law and not by everyday people that know nothing
